## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at Position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chests at Positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), and (49.5, -80.5)
- Wooden Chest at Position (41.5, -79.5)
- Burner Inserters at Positions (43.5, -80.5), (41.5, -78.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnaces at Positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), (-9.0, -48.0)
- Iron Chests at Positions (-18.5, -48.5), (-16.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -48.5), (-13.5, -49.5), (-16.5, -47.5), (-17.5, -47.5), (-14.5, -47.5), (-15.5, -47.5)
- Wooden Chests at Positions (-12.5, -49.5), (-11.5, -45.5), (-10.5, -45.5), (-9.5, -49.5)
- Burner Inserters at Positions (-11.5, -49.5), (-10.5, -49.5), (-8.5, -49.5), (-7.5, -48.5), (-12.5, -44.5), (-10.5, -44.5), (-8.5, -44.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors in Furnace Operations Due to Lack of Iron Ore
- Ensure to maintain a sufficient supply of iron ore in your inventory before attempting to insert it into furnaces. Regularly check and replenish your inventory as needed.

### Errors with Full Chests Blocking Operations
- Regularly monitor and empty chests that are full to prevent blockage of mining drills and inserters. This will ensure continuous operation and prevent warnings related to full chests.

### Errors with Inserters Waiting for Space in Destination
- Ensure that the destination for inserters is not blocked. Regularly check and clear any blockages to maintain efficient operation of inserters.
